item.description:
Join Untapped Games for our pre-release Gatecrash sealed deck tournaments on Saturday, January 26th, 2013 at 12:00am (after FNM) and 2:30 pm. New players and MTG veterans are all welcome! The cost for each tournament is $15 when you pre-register, or $18 at the door. You will receive a specialized guildpack featuring 5 Gatecrash booster packs, one Guild booster pack, a spindown life counter, and more! These prerelease cards are yours to keep! The afternoon tournament will be four rounds, and the prizes will be as follows:

4W-0L = 3 Packs
3W-1L = 2 Packs
2W-2L = 1 Packs

There is also a $6 buy-in to receive 2 extra Gatecrash booster packs (while supplies last; buy-in packs cannot be used in sealed deck tournament).

Feel free to call 401-368-1619 if you have any questions or need help finding us!

Reminder: If you are not preregistering, the door charge is $18. Preregister in store any time before Jan 25.
item.name: Gatecrash Prerelease at Untapped Games (Pre-register for only $15!)
